turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Morning, Curt, can I ask you a favor? Could you order me a drink at Peet's? I have a meeting in 10 minutes and I'm dying for something.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which one do you want me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one at 1829 14th Street NW

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okey doke. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm really into their Golden Caffe Lattes these days.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a medium.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just regular milk? They have a bunch of different kinds

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, just regular. Two percent.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you take sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks. It already has honey in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh! Is that the one they make with turmeric?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not judging, but it sounds kind of weird to me.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's amazing. You should try one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll take your word for it. Do you want whipped cream or any extras on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Stop trying to fatten me up! I'm good--just the way it is made, except 2 percent milk instead of whole.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Let me call it in now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cool, I'll wait.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right, you're all set. The drink will be waiting for you and the receipt should come to you by text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, you're a life saver. I'll just have time to grab it before this meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See you later at the office.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: See you.
